Note: IAAS is basically a computer (with an OS) in the cloud.
Always be aware of the SLA offered by your cloud provider. You gotta make sure that you're confortable with it and that it can adequately compensate you for damages.

Before migrating to the cloud, consider:\nCost, Security, Availability, Performance, Whether to migrate or to just entirely rebuild your application in the cloud, Enterprise-grade functionality, and tools that can help.
A container is basically an isolated portion of an OS with everything needed to run an application.
Object storage is used to store unstructured (unordered) data (like images) for websites/webapps. Most popular is Amazon s3
A bucket is simply a storage container in which objects are stored
